sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import * as d3 from 'd3' const MultiLevelPieChart = () => { useEffect(() => { drawChart() }, []) const drawChart = () => { const width = 400 const height = 400 const radius = Math.min(width, height) / 2 const color = d3.scaleOrdinal(d3.schemeCategory10) const svg = d3 .select('#chart-container') .append('svg') .attr('width', width) .attr('height', height) .append('g') .attr('transform', `translate(${width / 2},${height / 2})`) const data = { label: 'A', children: [ { label: 'A1', value: 100 }, { label: 'A2', value: 200 }, { label: 'A3', value: 300 }, ], } const partition = d3.partition().size([2 * Math.PI, radius * radius]) const root = d3.hierarchy(data).sum((d) => d.value) partition(root) const arc = d3 .arc() .startAngle((d) => d.x0) .endAngle((d) => d.x1) .innerRadius((d) => Math.sqrt(d.y0)) .outerRadius((d) => Math.sqrt(d.y1)) svg .selectAll('path') .data(root.descendants()) .enter() .append('path') .attr('display', (d) => (d.depth ? null : 'none')) .attr('d', arc) .style('stroke', '#fff') .style('fill', (d) => color((d.children ? d : d.parent).data.label)) .append('title') .text((d) => d.data.label) } return
} export default MultiLevelPieChart
